recipesJson.name: razzle berry cream
recipesJson.author: NastyNate
recipesJson.description: Insanely creamy strawzzle berry cheesecake. I cranked TPA Bavarian Cream just to see what would happen. It turned out great.

reviews.text: "It turned out great" is such an understatement. Insanely rich and thick creamy mouthfeel, and that razzleberry layer is amazing! Very well done, and highly recommended. Vaping it at a two week steep.
